longBusinessSummary.0: Relaxo Footwears Limited manufactures and sells footwear for men, women, and kids in India and internationally. It offers casual, running, athleisure, walking, formal, sports, school, and training and gym shoes. The company also provides slippers, sandals, flip flops, slides, chappals, casuals, belles, and clogs. In addition, it offers footwear accessories. The company provides its products under the Relaxo, Bahamas, Flite, Sparx, BOSTON, and Mary Jane brands. It sells its products through 394 exclusive brand outlets; and e-commerce portals. Relaxo Footwears Limited was founded in 1976 and is based in New Delhi, India.
